welcome_message_body: Welcome to Atlanta, where Southern charm meets urban sophistication! Discover the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and world-class dining and entertainment. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that Atlanta has to offer!

restaurants.name: The Optimist
restaurants.description: The Optimist is a seafood restaurant located in Atlanta.
restaurants.address: 914 Howell Mill Rd NW (9th St NW), Atlanta, GA 30318

restaurants.name: Bottle Rocket Fine Food and Beverage
restaurants.description: Bottle Rocket Fine Food and Beverage is a sushi restaurant located in Atlanta.
restaurants.address: 180 Walker St SW (Haynes St.), Atlanta, GA 30313

restaurants.description: Atlanta Breakfast Club is a american restaurant located in Atlanta.

restaurants.description: Miller Union is a american restaurant located in Atlanta.

restaurants.name: Barcelona Wine Bar

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Fulton County Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at College Park Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers exclusive amenities.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal North
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights, with 40 gates and various amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal South
terminals.description: The international terminal, with 12 gates and customs and immigration facilities.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per session, with option to purchase additional time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport provides all necessary facilities for international travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Gwinnett County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
